title: what does it meeeeeeeean
body: does anybody else see this too please

replies.body:
With the oncoming introduction of new games, they're transitioning from League of Legends accounts (regional) to Riot accounts (global).

Particularly when it comes to mobile games which aren't generally regional, it's easier for all involved to have one centralised account than a bunch of different ones for each Riot game they play.

Essentially, you will have to confirm (if your UN is unique) or choose (if it's not) a username for your Riot account, and your LoL account will become that Riot account.

It's worth noting that if you are prompted to change your UN because it exists elsewhere but your UN is reasonably unique, chances are it's conflicting with an account that you have on a different region, so if you want to keep the same UN for your OCE account, you'll have to cahnge those other regions first.
oh yeah and replays aren't downloading anymore after I kept uploading replays to support when the trolls got even worse or more numerous

okay ty, what about the other posts please https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/mKxnEFsz-does-it-mean-the-stacks-apply-to-other-keystones-by-stacking-with-them-11-through-carryover-and - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/2oORkgig-are-friend-teams-queuing-together-in-tft-ranked-still-possible-because-otherwise-thats-some-pretty - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/EHr9Zurb-woodland-lux-is-nice (this 1 has a few questions everywhere) - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/AniE1WGo-are-we-supposed-to-be-able-to-make-new-recurve-bows-through-zed-ult-please - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/bi3ABuNV-anybody-tried-snaring-enemy-champs-with-ward-teleport-yet - https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/wE33gNEw-has-anybody-else-seen-grasp-of-the-undying-trigger-without-champ-dmg-or-units-switching-targets-in - Is morellos heal reduction included in s rank too/yet please?
